replies.body: There should be an option to opt out of TFT downloads and updates. I don't and wont play it, it doesn't interest me and I'm already annoyed about it updating.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I don't either, but it takes like 5 mins lol. Just have a quick wank and get back to solo queue, problem solved. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I hotspot my phone for internet because its cheaper and better than what is available in my area. So limiting the amount of downloads stops me getting shaped before the end of the month. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
NERF LUCIAN SHOULD NOT BE ABLE TO ULT IN SPELL BOUND FORM IT'S TOO BROKEN. OR UP HIS MANA COST ALOT...
you know it's getting nerfed lmao
hush and swordbreaker nerfed too much 27.5% is good
